projects.title: Food for Thought
projects.description: Created web application allowing users to identify harmful ingredients/allergens in their food by scanning label. To provide more personalized results, created profile system allowing users to input pertinent medical information. Placed 2nd at hackathon with ~200 participants.

projects.title: Blue Origin - Killer Application
projects.description: Evaluated viability of potential commercial space ventures including space-based solar power, silicon mining. Conducted competitive landscape + internal analysis on company operations; summarized findings in a 30-page report presented to Blue Origin employees.
